sentences.sentence: You found that <color=red>ticket</color>, huh? I... I guess there's no hiding it.
Look, it’s not something I’m proud of. I go to the fast food place every Wednesday at noon. It’s a bad habit, alright?
I know it’s stupid, but sometimes... I just need a break from everything. I don’t have time for anything else.
I know, it’s a weakness. I’m not some perfect guy, but it’s my mistake, okay?
But listen, if you want to talk to someone who’s really been pushing people into bad decisions, you should talk to the butcher.
<color=red>He</color> has a way of convincing people to do things they shouldn’t. I’m telling you, he’s the one you should be looking at.
I’m just trying to get through my day, but he... he knows how to get under people’s skin.
I know it looks bad, but it’s just a stupid habit. Talk to <color=red>him</color>, and maybe you’ll understand what I mean.
Please, don’t make this into something bigger than it is. The butcher’s the one who’s really involved.
If you want answers, he’s the one to talk to. Not me.
